LABEL: 0x2BC
STRING: 「Phew...」

LABEL: 0x2D6
STRING: At Hiragino's urging, I headed back to my room.

LABEL: 0x314
STRING: My shoulders grew heavy as soon as I let out a sigh.

LABEL: 0x348
STRING: For some reason, it had been a while since I was alone.

LABEL: 0x380
STRING: Thinking back, I felt like I'd been with someone the whole time, keeping my guard up.

LABEL: 0x3CC
STRING: Troubles, big and small...

LABEL: 0x3EE
STRING: How did it keep happening?

LABEL: 0x428
STRING: However, I wasn't the only one involved in those troubles.

LABEL: 0x4EF
STRING: It was already past 17:00.

LABEL: 0x513
STRING: It had been a full day since the <SHEEP III> had sunk.

LABEL: 0x542
STRING: Everyone was clearly exhausted, both physically and mentally.

LABEL: 0x5DB
STRING: And somewhere on this ship could be the assailant who attacked Reiri...

LABEL: 0x621
STRING: But, if I didn't rest now when I could, I wouldn't have enough stamina until help arrived.

LABEL: 0x6D4
STRING: I wondered if the others were resting.

LABEL: 0x7BE
STRING: Touri and Reiri were together in the next room.

LABEL: 0x7F6
STRING: There was no telling what Reiri might do on her own, for sure.

LABEL: 0x832
STRING: But Touri was with her, and there were her own physical limitations too.

LABEL: 0x86E
STRING: It should be fine to relax on that front.

LABEL: 0x92D
STRING: Yukari was probably still sleeping in her room as well.

LABEL: 0x95F
STRING: Come to think of it, she hadn't shown herself even once earlier.

LABEL: 0x995
STRING: Maybe I should wake her up now and have her watch over the wheelhouse...

LABEL: 0x9E7
STRING: I suddenly remembered her sleeping figure from when I had snuck in.

LABEL: 0xA51
STRING: Hmm.

LABEL: 0xA67
STRING: She was pretty cute when she didn't talk.

LABEL: 0xAF2
STRING: Never mind that.

LABEL: 0xB0C
STRING: I didn't feel comfortable waking her up when she was so tired and sound asleep.

LABEL: 0xB4E
STRING: I decided not to do anything unnecessary.

LABEL: 0xB92
STRING: ――Now then.

LABEL: 0xBAA
STRING: All that was left was Miss Trouble.

LABEL: 0xC29
STRING: 「...Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0xC45
STRING: Hiragino had dragged her with him. I wondered if she was okay.

LABEL: 0xD5D
STRING: Actually, was Hiragino okay?

LABEL: 0xD89
STRING: Was he resting properly?

LABEL: 0xDA7
STRING: Would he be able to control that girl by himself?

LABEL: 0xDE3
STRING: 「Those two are not very compatible...」

LABEL: 0xE09
STRING: Tokiwa seemed to like him a lot,

LABEL: 0xE41
STRING: but there was no trace of it on Hiragino's face when they were together.

LABEL: 0xECD
STRING: I couldn't imagine it going well.

LABEL: 0xEF5
STRING: Maybe I should go help Hiragino...

LABEL: 0xF2B
STRING: That said, even I was tired.

LABEL: 0xF59
STRING: Honestly, I just wanted to rest like this.

LABEL: 0xF87
STRING: I was sure I'd fall asleep in five seconds if I went to bed now.

LABEL: 0x1037
STRING: I looked back and forth between the door and the bed.

LABEL: 0x105D
STRING: What should I do...?

LABEL: 0x107D
STRING: ――Okay, I've made up my mind!

LABEL: 0x109B
STRING: Let's go to sleep.

LABEL: 0x10B7
STRING: For just a bit...

LABEL: 0x10E1
STRING: I'll deal with whatever comes my way after I wake up, be it Reiri or Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x1119
STRING: So, just for now――

LABEL: 0x11A0
STRING: I collapsed face-down onto the bed with a thud.

LABEL: 0x11D4
STRING: 「POL.」

LABEL: 0x11E9
STRING: 「Wake me up in fifteen minutes.」

LABEL: 0x120F
STRING: 【As you wish.】

LABEL: 0x1236
STRING: The lights slowly dimmed, inviting me to sleep.

LABEL: 0x12C3
STRING: ...POL seemed to be back now that the blackout was over.

LABEL: 0x1355
STRING: ...But... It was weird to say this now, but I felt like I'd heard this voice before...

LABEL: 0x1402
STRING: But... where..?

LABEL: 0x147F
STRING: ...Somewhere... far away...

LABEL: 0x15A7
STRING: I woke up to a knock on the door.

LABEL: 0x15CD
STRING: I looked at the clock, thinking I had overslept.

LABEL: 0x15FB
STRING: ...It hadn't even been five minutes.

LABEL: 0x162E
STRING: No wonder POL didn't wake me up.

LABEL: 0x168C
STRING: 「Uh, yeah, yeah...」

LABEL: 0x16B0
STRING: The inside of my mouth was so dry it was disgusting.

LABEL: 0x16DE
STRING: I got out of bed and headed for the door.

LABEL: 0x1716
STRING: I opened the it and glared at my visitor.

LABEL: 0x17E2
STRING: 「Hey, sorry about that.」

LABEL: 0x1807
STRING: 「What is it now...?」

LABEL: 0x189B
STRING: 「Have you seen Tokiwa?」

LABEL: 0x18C8
STRING: Tokiwa...

LABEL: 0x18E2
STRING: I could only let out a sigh at the situation, which I had half-expected.

LABEL: 0x1914
STRING: 「She ran away, did she?」

LABEL: 0x199C
STRING: 「She ran away.」

LABEL: 0x19BD
STRING: 「Right...」

LABEL: 0x19D9
STRING: She didn't betray my expectations.

LABEL: 0x19FF
STRING: Hiragino ruffled his hair with a tired expression.

LABEL: 0x1A99
STRING: 「That girl!」

LABEL: 0x1AB5
STRING: 「What does she mean, "hide-and-seek?!"」

LABEL: 0x1AE1
STRING: 「"If you catch me, you can do whatever you want," she said!」

LABEL: 0x1B23
STRING: 「There's not a single part in that process that benefits me!」

LABEL: 0x1BC0
STRING: 「Damn it...」

LABEL: 0x1BDA
STRING: 「Why do I keep attracting these people...?」

LABEL: 0x1C15
STRING: Hiragino raised his voice, but his tone soon weakened.

LABEL: 0x1C53
STRING: This was really tiring...

LABEL: 0x1C81
STRING: Did she have infinite stamina or something?

LABEL: 0x1CAB
STRING: I felt like it was pointless to worry about her anymore...

LABEL: 0x1CFD
STRING: 「I don't think it's a good idea to leave her alone...」

LABEL: 0x1D48
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x1D67
STRING: He staggered over to the wall as he spoke.

LABEL: 0x1DA9
STRING: ...No matter how you looked at it, he was nearing his limit.

LABEL: 0x1DD7
STRING: 「Why don't you take a break?」

LABEL: 0x1E12
STRING: 「I think I'll do just that.」

LABEL: 0x1EF1
STRING: 「Come on in.」

LABEL: 0x1F18
STRING: 「Thanks.」

LABEL: 0x1F39
STRING: I offered him a chair, and he sat down and took a deep breath.

LABEL: 0x1F79
STRING: He looked awfully haggard...

LABEL: 0x1F9F
STRING: Well, I guess it was no wonder...

LABEL: 0x1FC3
STRING: And what was that stuck on his fingers... A band-aid?

LABEL: 0x2007
STRING: 「What's wrong with your hand?」

LABEL: 0x20A1
STRING: 「Oh, this?」

LABEL: 0x20BF
STRING: 「When I was dealing with the fish earlier, I cut it with a dorsal fin or something.」

LABEL: 0x2168
STRING: 「It's nothing serious.」

LABEL: 0x2193
STRING: Hiragino waved his hand at me dismissively.

LABEL: 0x21C1
STRING: Even if it was a small cut, it would be dumb to tell a doctor to be careful in the deep sea.

LABEL: 0x221F
STRING: Unlike Touri yesterday, he must be treating it properly.

LABEL: 0x2272
STRING: 「More importantly, Katagiri-kun...」

LABEL: 0x229C
STRING: 「How are you feeling?」

LABEL: 0x22C1
STRING: 「Oh, I'm feeling better already.」

LABEL: 0x22EF
STRING: There were no lies in what I said.

LABEL: 0x2313
STRING: The scent of death had given me a mild panic earlier,

LABEL: 0x234D
STRING: but as long as I remained calm, it wasn't anything I couldn't handle.

LABEL: 0x2393
STRING: 「Really. I was just tired, so there's no need to worry too much.」

LABEL: 0x23F6
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x246F
STRING: 「――Oh, did I wake you up?」

LABEL: 0x24CA
STRING: I looked at the disheveled bed.

LABEL: 0x24F2
STRING: You could still see my body's outline on it.

LABEL: 0x252E
STRING: This was kind of embarrassing...

LABEL: 0x25C4
STRING: 「If that's the case, sorry...」

LABEL: 0x25F5
STRING: 「It's nothing. I'm sure you've had it harder than me.」

LABEL: 0x2637
STRING: 「You haven't slept much, have you?」

LABEL: 0x2678
STRING: 「Well, you're right about that.」

LABEL: 0x2703
STRING: 「As I've said many times before, I'm used to this sort of thing.」

LABEL: 0x2746
STRING: I could see unconcealable exhaustion in his eyes as he smiled.

LABEL: 0x279D
STRING: 「When I was young, I worked the night shift a lot...」

LABEL: 0x282A
STRING: 「No, I'm still young, I mean!」

LABEL: 0x2864
STRING: Right...

LABEL: 0x287C
STRING: Even if he was now trapped inside the <SHEEP III>, Hiragino was a doctor.

LABEL: 0x28D9
STRING: He should be stationed at universities, hospitals, and other places like that,

LABEL: 0x290B
STRING: not in an incomprehensible environment like this.

LABEL: 0x296F
STRING: When he was my age, he should've been an intern...

LABEL: 0x29A3
STRING: That meant that he'd decided on his future to some extent by then.

LABEL: 0x29EB
STRING: He probably didn't expect to end up in a submarine, but...

LABEL: 0x2A35
STRING: 「Hiragino-san.」

LABEL: 0x2ABB
STRING: 「Hm?」

LABEL: 0x2AD6
STRING: 「Why did you become a doctor?」

LABEL: 0x2B0E
STRING: It wasn't something to ask at a time like this, but on the other hand, I didn't think I'd get another chance.

LABEL: 0x2BD4
STRING: 「The reason I became a doctor...」

LABEL: 0x2BFE
STRING: 「It's been a while since I've been asked that.」

LABEL: 0x2C2F
STRING: 「Sorry for asking out of the blue...」

LABEL: 0x2CC7
STRING: 「No, it's okay.」

LABEL: 0x2D01
STRING: 「It sure is nice to be a student...」

LABEL: 0x2D2A
STRING: Apparently, he was thinking back to the time when he was the same age as me.

LABEL: 0x2D6E
STRING: Different times, different departments. I don't think we had much in common as far as university went, but...

LABEL: 0x2E1B
STRING: After thinking for a moment, Hiragino slowly opened his mouth.

LABEL: 0x2E5E
STRING: 「...Have you ever read Camus?」

LABEL: 0x2EB3
STRING: Albert Camus.

LABEL: 0x2ED5
STRING: "The Stranger," was it?

LABEL: 0x2EF3
STRING: I remembered reading it when I was an undergraduate.

LABEL: 0x2F21
STRING: One day, a young man suddenly shot someone dead.

LABEL: 0x2F57
STRING: When asked why he had killed them, he answered:

LABEL: 0x2F8B
STRING: "Que c'etait a cause du soleil."

LABEL: 0x2FBB
STRING: "Because the sun was bright."

LABEL: 0x2FE3
STRING: Speaking of bright suns――

LABEL: 0x3009
STRING: 「――Are you talking about "the Fourth Day?"」

LABEL: 0x30A1
STRING: 「Hmm?――

LABEL: 0x310E
STRING: Aah.」

LABEL: 0x3127
STRING: Hiragino's eyes widened in surprise.

LABEL: 0x3155
STRING: Maybe I was reading too much into it... or so I thought, but he nodded a few times.

LABEL: 0x3209
STRING: 「That's right...」

LABEL: 0x3227
STRING: 「Thinking back on it, it might've been since that day.」

LABEL: 0x3264
STRING: 「...Did something happen?」

LABEL: 0x32FC
STRING: 「That day...」

LABEL: 0x3318
STRING: 「I think I took on the mission of "saving people's lives."」

LABEL: 0x336C
STRING: 「...Because that's the only way I can make amends.」

LABEL: 0x33C3
STRING: That sounded like a meaningful line.

LABEL: 0x33E3
STRING: "Saving people's lives" was a mission that any doctor in the field had to carry out.

LABEL: 0x342F
STRING: I wasn't sure how that related to "the Fourth Day"...

LABEL: 0x3463
STRING: Not only Touri, but had Hiragino also been involved in the Aqualine accident...?

LABEL: 0x350C
STRING: Right after boarding the <SHEEP III>, Hiragino had been staring at the <Isle of Wind>.

LABEL: 0x3553
STRING: He was looking off into the distance with the same pained eyes as he did back then.

LABEL: 0x358F
STRING: ...He was considerate of everyone, nonchalantly supported Yukari, and sometimes gave out orders.

LABEL: 0x35DF
STRING: He was the oldest of us survivors, and he was trying to fulfill his role as a reliable adult.

LABEL: 0x362F
STRING: The way he bantered and dealt with the girls left a certain impression on me,

LABEL: 0x3675
STRING: but was that really his true self?

LABEL: 0x36AB
STRING: I couldn't help but think that his true nature lay beyond that occasional distant look in his eyes.

LABEL: 0x3705
STRING: What was he looking at?

LABEL: 0x3739
STRING: Just who was at the end of his line of sight?

LABEL: 0x383E
STRING: 「...Sorry, I'm talking by myself here.」

LABEL: 0x386F
STRING: Hiragino smiled cheerfully as usual.

LABEL: 0x38AB
STRING: In the end, I couldn't ask more about his past.

LABEL: 0x3903
STRING: ...Well, whatever.

LABEL: 0x3921
STRING: Let's wait until things have calmed down to talk about it properly.

LABEL: 0x394D
STRING: After we'd been rescued, for example.

LABEL: 0x3AB7
STRING: 「That's right...」

LABEL: 0x3AD3
STRING: 「There was something I wanted to tell you.」

LABEL: 0x3B07
STRING: 「If it's something you don't want to hear, just tell me.」

LABEL: 0x3B3E
STRING: 「What is it?」

LABEL: 0x3B69
STRING: 「It's about that finger.」

LABEL: 0x3CE3
STRING: Discomfort welled up in my throat.

LABEL: 0x3D09
STRING: Calm down... Why was I so shaken up over this?

LABEL: 0x3D41
STRING: This wasn't the time to be saying that I couldn't handle the smell of death.

LABEL: 0x3D7B
STRING: My priority was to resolve this situation.

LABEL: 0x3E04
STRING: 「...It's fine. Let me hear it.」

LABEL: 0x3E30
STRING: I took a deep breath.

LABEL: 0x3E4C
STRING: Hiragino slowly nodded and began to speak.

LABEL: 0x3EE6
STRING: 「After that, I couldn't leave that finger as it was, so I did a little research.」

LABEL: 0x3F3C
STRING: 「But with the tools at hand and in an environment like this...」

LABEL: 0x3F7E
STRING: 「The water pressure had considerably degenerated the tissue, but the decay rate had slowed since it was kept at a low temperature in the deep sea.」

LABEL: 0x3FE4
STRING: 「So there's only so much I can say at this point, but...」

LABEL: 0x4020
STRING: 「Even with that in mind, that finger...」

LABEL: 0x40C3
STRING: 「It seems the cells were active just a few hours ago.」

LABEL: 0x4104
STRING: 「What did you say?」

LABEL: 0x4122
STRING: I couldn't believe Hiragino's words.

LABEL: 0x4144
STRING: The cells of the person who died in yesterday's sinking accident were still active until just a moment ago?

LABEL: 0x4198
STRING: ――Impossible.

LABEL: 0x41B6
STRING: What was he talking about?

LABEL: 0x4296
STRING: 「...Isn't there some kind of a mistake?」

LABEL: 0x42D5
STRING: 「Let me be clear here.」

LABEL: 0x42F5
STRING: 「Until a few hours before we discovered that finger,

LABEL: 0x432F
STRING: it was still alive.」

LABEL: 0x4383
STRING: 「That finger doesn't belong to someone who died in the rear section.」

LABEL: 0x43CA
STRING: 「Then who are you saying it belongs to――」

LABEL: 0x4412
STRING: We had already confirmed that there were no survivors in the rear section.

LABEL: 0x4448
STRING: That meant the owner of that finger had been alive in the front section.

LABEL: 0x44DF
STRING: ――And until just a moment ago as well.

LABEL: 0x4509
STRING: A survivor who didn't show themselves.

LABEL: 0x452B
STRING: I soon realized one possibility.

LABEL: 0x455F
STRING: Last night, "someone" attacked Reiri and disappeared.

LABEL: 0x4587
STRING: "One more" survivor――

LABEL: 0x4648
STRING: 「Wha――」

LABEL: 0x4671
STRING: 「Get down!」

LABEL: 0x46B2
STRING: No sooner had he spoken did I follow Hiragino's example and lowered myself to the floor.

LABEL: 0x4743
STRING: A dangerous noise.

LABEL: 0x475D
STRING: The door suddenly opened.

LABEL: 0x4779
STRING: What――

LABEL: 0x478F
STRING: Who――

LABEL: 0x47A5
STRING: I was confused.

LABEL: 0x47C1
STRING: The atmosphere was tense.

LABEL: 0x47DD
STRING: I didn't move.

LABEL: 0x47F5
STRING: I couldn't move.

LABEL: 0x480D
STRING: ...I guess I'd let my guard down too much.

LABEL: 0x4839
STRING: That was an out-of-place regret.

LABEL: 0x4913
STRING: The girls' faces flashed through my mind.

LABEL: 0x493B
STRING: I hope they were safe, at least...

LABEL: 0x4A64
STRING: The door was open.

LABEL: 0x4A82
STRING: I could feel a presence on the other side.

LABEL: 0x4AA8
STRING: However, they didn't move from there.

LABEL: 0x4ADA
STRING: They were sneering at us as we were defenseless... I could just picture it.

LABEL: 0x4B28
STRING: I timidly turned my attention to the door from behind the desk.

LABEL: 0x4B5E
STRING: Slim legs.

LABEL: 0x4B74
STRING: A slender body.

LABEL: 0x4B8C
STRING: A familiar uniform.

LABEL: 0x4BA8
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0x4BC2
STRING: There stood Yukari, her face red with anger.

LABEL: 0x4C51
STRING: 「Yukari-san...?」

LABEL: 0x4C7E
STRING: 「So you were here.」

LABEL: 0x4CA0
STRING: 「Both of you...」

LABEL: 0x4D1D
STRING: 「Get to the wheelhouse!」
